package com.dmw.basedemo.reflect;

package com.dmw.basedemo.reflect;

import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.lang.reflect.Field;

public class Demo5Application {
	//è·å–ä¸€ä¸ªç±»é‡Œé¢çš„æ‰€æœ‰ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè·å–åˆ°ä¹‹åå†æ‰§è¡Œå…¶ä»–çš„ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘(æ­¤ä¾‹å­ä¸ºè·å–å¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§å€¼å¹¶å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­)
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException {
        Student s = new Student("dmw",23);
        saveObject(s);
    }

    public static void saveObject(Object o) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException {
        //1.è·å–classå­—èŠ‚ç æ–‡ä»¶
        Class c = o.getClass();
        //2.åˆ›å»ºIOæµ
        BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("src\\a.txt"));
        //3.è·å–æ‰€æœ‰çš„æˆå‘˜å˜é‡
        Field[] fields = c.getDeclaredFields();

            Object value = f.get(o);
            bw.write(name+":"+value);
            bw.newLine();
        }
        bw.close();
    }
}
